SEARCH
Module com.example.inventory
Package Business.inventory

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
Business.inventory.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class contains the methods that modifies product data existing in the table changes added associated parts related to product to table also makes changes in removing associated parts related with product
Author:
Ayomide Adedeji
